paper.title: Supporting updates in heterogeneous distributed database systems

author.org: Comput. Eng. Program, Pennsylvania State Univ., University Park, PA, USA
Comput. Eng. Program, Pennsylvania State Univ., University Park, PA, USA

paper.abstract: The performance is studied of atomic updates across different database management systems (DBMSs). An optimistic concurrency-control algorithm is proposed that allows a subclass of global transactions to concurrently retrieve and update the multiple databases, while it places no restriction on the concurrency-control mechanisms used by each of the local DBMSs, thus maintaining local autonomy. u003e
